languages.text: "Боюсь, {name} фон Валанциус, у тебя нет выбора". {n}Кунрад извлекает на свет странное орудие — лезвие без рукоятки, на свету бликующее синим.{/n} "Если вздумаешь сопротивляться, я наглядно покажу тебе власть варпа над смертными. Знаешь, что? Пожалуй, мне даже доставит это определенное удовольствие".

traits.locale_text: "Боюсь, {name} фон Валанциус, у тебя нет выбора". {n}Кунрад извлекает на свет странное орудие — лезвие без рукоятки, на свету бликующее синим.{/n} "Если вздумаешь сопротивляться, я наглядно покажу тебе власть варпа над смертными. Знаешь, что? Пожалуй, мне даже доставит это определенное удовольствие".

languages.text: "I am afraid that you, {name} von Valancius, have no choice in the matter." {n}Voigtvir produces a strange object — a blade without a handle that shimmers blue in the light.{/n} "Try to resist, and I will demonstrate the power that the warp holds over mortals. Come to think of it, I might even take some pleasure in doing so."
languages.original_text: "Боюсь, {name} фон Валанциус, у тебя нет выбора". {n}Кунрад извлекает на свет странное орудие — лезвие без рукоятки, на свету бликующее синим.{/n} "Если вздумаешь сопротивляться, я наглядно покажу тебе власть варпа над смертными. Знаешь, что? Пожалуй, мне даже доставит это определенное удовольствие".

traits.locale_text: "I am afraid that you, {name} von Valancius, have no choice in the matter. Have a look at this." {n}Voigtvir produces a strange object — a blade without a handle that shimmers blue in the light.{/n} "Try to resist, and I will demonstrate the power that the warp holds over mortals. Come to think of it, I might take some pleasure in doing so."

Come to think of it, I might take some pleasure in doing so."

Come to think of it, I might take some pleasure in doing so."

"I am afraid that you, {name} von Valancius, have no choice in the matter." {n}Voigtvir produces a strange object — a blade without a handle that shimmers blue in the light.{/n} "Try to resist, and I will demonstrate the power that the warp holds over mortals. Come to think of it, I might even take some pleasure in doing so."

"I am afraid that you, {name} von Valancius, have no choice in the matter." {n}Voigtvir produces a strange object — a blade without a handle that shimmers blue in the light.{/n} "Try to resist, and I will demonstrate the power that the warp holds over mortals. Come to think of it, I might even take some pleasure in doing so."

"I am afraid that you, {name} von Valancius, have no choice in the matter." {n}Voigtvir produces a strange object — a blade without a handle that shimmers blue in the light.{/n} "Try to resist, and I will demonstrate the power that the warp holds over mortals. Come to think of it, I might even take some pleasure in doing so."

languages.text: “恐怕你，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，在这件事情上别无选择。”{n}维特威尔拿出了一件古怪的造物。那是一把没有刀柄的刀，刀刃上泛着蓝色的光芒。{/n}“你尽可以反抗试试。我可以让你意识到，凡人无法抵挡亚空间的力量。仔细想想，说不定这件事情还挺有意思的。”
languages.original_text: "I am afraid that you, {name} von Valancius, have no choice in the matter." {n}Voigtvir produces a strange object — a blade without a handle that shimmers blue in the light.{/n} "Try to resist, and I will demonstrate the power that the warp holds over mortals. Come to think of it, I might even take some pleasure in doing so."

traits.locale_text: “恐怕你，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，在这件事情上别无选择。”{n}维特威尔拿出了一件古怪的造物。那是一把没有刀柄的刀，刀刃上泛着蓝色的光芒。{/n}“你尽可以反抗试试。我可以让你意识到，凡人无法抵挡亚空间的力量。仔细想想，说不定这件事情还挺有意思的。”

languages.text: «Me temo que no tiene elección, {name} von Valancius». {n}Voigtvir saca un extraño objeto, como un cuchillo sin mango que brilla azul bajo la luz.{/n} «Intente resistirse y demostraré el poder que la disformidad posee sobre los mortales. Bien pensado, creo que disfrutaré de esa opción».
languages.original_text: "I am afraid that you, {name} von Valancius, have no choice in the matter." {n}Voigtvir produces a strange object — a blade without a handle that shimmers blue in the light.{/n} "Try to resist, and I will demonstrate the power that the warp holds over mortals. Come to think of it, I might even take some pleasure in doing so."

traits.locale_text: «Me temo que no tiene elección, {name} von Valancius». {n}Voigtvir saca un extraño objeto, como un cuchillo sin mango que brilla azul bajo la luz.{/n} «Intente resistirse y demostraré el poder que la disformidad posee sobre los mortales. Bien pensado, creo que disfrutaré de esa opción».

languages.text: 「悪いがお前、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスには選択の余地はない」{n}ボイトヴィルは奇妙な物を取り出す。光を受けると青く光る柄のない刃。{/n}「抵抗してみろ。そうすれば<歪み>が死ぬ運命にある者に対して持つ力を私が実証してみせよう。よくよく考えれば、私もこれに喜びを感じるかもしれない」
languages.original_text: "I am afraid that you, {name} von Valancius, have no choice in the matter." {n}Voigtvir produces a strange object — a blade without a handle that shimmers blue in the light.{/n} "Try to resist, and I will demonstrate the power that the warp holds over mortals. Come to think of it, I might even take some pleasure in doing so."

traits.locale_text: 「悪いがお前、{name}フォン・ヴァランシウスには選択の余地はない」{n}ボイドヴィルは奇妙な物を取り出す。光を受けると青く光る柄のない刃。{/n}「抵抗してみろ。そうすれば<歪み>が死ぬ運命にある者に対して持つ力を私が実証してみせよう。よくよく考えれば、私もこれに喜びを感じるかもしれない」
「悪いがお前、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスには選択の余地はない」{n}ボイトヴィルは奇妙な物を取り出す。光を受けると青く光る柄のない刃。{/n}「抵抗してみろ。そうすれば<歪み>が死ぬ運命にある者に対して持つ力を私が実証してみせよう。よくよく考えれば、私もこれに喜びを感じるかもしれない」

languages.text: « Je crains que vous n'ayez guère le choix, {name} von Valancius. » {n}Voigtvir sort brusquement un étrange objet : une lame sans manche qui scintille d'une lueur bleue.{/n} « Si vous essayez de résister, je vous ferai une démonstration du pouvoir que le Warp exerce sur les mortels. Maintenant que j'y pense, je crois que j'y prendrais même un certain plaisir. »
languages.original_text: "I am afraid that you, {name} von Valancius, have no choice in the matter." {n}Voigtvir produces a strange object — a blade without a handle that shimmers blue in the light.{/n} "Try to resist, and I will demonstrate the power that the warp holds over mortals. Come to think of it, I might even take some pleasure in doing so."

traits.locale_text: « Je crains que vous n'ayez guère le choix, {name} von Valancius. » {n}Voigtvir sort brusquement un étrange objet : une lame sans manche qui scintille d'une lueur bleue.{/n} « Si vous essayez de résister, je vous ferai une démonstration du pouvoir que le Warp exerce sur les mortels. Maintenant que j'y pense, je crois que j'y prendrais même un certain plaisir. »

languages.text: "Ich fürchte, dass Ihr, {name} von Valancius, dabei keine Wahl haben werdet." {n}Voigtvir zieht ein seltsames Objekt hervor – eine Klinge ohne Griff, die im Licht blau schimmert.{/n} "Versucht, Euch zu weigern, und ich werde die Macht des Warp über Sterbliche demonstrieren. Und wo ich so darüber nachdenke, könnte mir das sogar Freude bereiten."
languages.original_text: "I am afraid that you, {name} von Valancius, have no choice in the matter." {n}Voigtvir produces a strange object — a blade without a handle that shimmers blue in the light.{/n} "Try to resist, and I will demonstrate the power that the warp holds over mortals. Come to think of it, I might even take some pleasure in doing so."

traits.locale_text: "Ich fürchte, dass Ihr, {name} von Valancius, dabei keine Wahl haben werdet." {n}Voigtvir zieht ein seltsames Objekt hervor – eine Klinge ohne Griff, die im Licht blau schimmert.{/n} "Versucht, Euch zu weigern, und ich werde die Macht des Warp über Sterbliche demonstrieren. Und wo ich so darüber nachdenke, könnte mir das sogar Freude bereiten."

languages.original_text: "I am afraid that you, {name} von Valancius, have no choice in the matter." {n}Voigtvir produces a strange object — a blade without a handle that shimmers blue in the light.{/n} "Try to resist, and I will demonstrate the power that the warp holds over mortals. Come to think of it, I might even take some pleasure in doing so."

languages.text: "Maalesef {name} von Valancius, bu konuda söz hakkın yok." {n}Voigtvir, garip bir nesne çıkarıyor: Işıkta mavi mavi parlayan sapsız bir bıçak.{/n} "Karşı koymaya çalışırsan öteboyutun fâniler üstünde sahip olduğu kudreti gösteririm sana. Aslına bakarsan bunu yapmaktan keyif bile duyabilirim."
languages.original_text: "I am afraid that you, {name} von Valancius, have no choice in the matter." {n}Voigtvir produces a strange object — a blade without a handle that shimmers blue in the light.{/n} "Try to resist, and I will demonstrate the power that the warp holds over mortals. Come to think of it, I might even take some pleasure in doing so."
